params._admin: The addresses of the account to grant permissions.

params._pauser: The address to grant pauser permissions.

freezeUnfreeze(bool).details: When freezing, pause is always applied too. When unfreezing, the contract is left in paused stated.

params._freeze: true when freezing, false when unfreezing

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

migrateToNewStakingContract().details: Staking contract needs to be set before by the owner. Currently not implemented, just needed for the interface.     In case it's needed at some point in the future,     the implementation needs to be changed first.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._pause: true when pausing, false when unpausing

params._admin: The addresses of the account to revoke permissions.

params._pauser: The address to grant pauser permissions.

setNewStakingContract(address).details: Doesn't have any influence as long as migrateToNewStakingContract is not implemented.

params._newStakingContract: The address of the new staking contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

migrateToNewStakingContract().notice: Allow a staker to migrate his positions to the new staking contract.

setFeeSharing(address).notice: Allow the owner to set a fee sharing proxy contract. We need it for unstaking with slashing.

setNewStakingContract(address).notice: Allow the owner to set a new staking contract. As a consequence it allows the stakers to migrate their positions to the new contract.

setWeightScaling(uint96).notice: Allow the owner to set weight scaling. We need it for unstaking with slashing.

userdoc.notice: Implements administrative functionality pause, freeze and setting addresses and parameters related to staking
